name: Wishmere
description: Wishmere is a brawler-fighting game that gives you the power and creativity to fight your battles your way. Play with friends in local matches, discover the story of Wishmere or survive and conquer over 30+ challenge maps!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 2.4GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Controller / arcade stick highly recommended. Minimum Resolution: 640 x 360
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit or above Processor: 3.3GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Controller / arcade stick highly recommended. Minimum Resolution: 640 x 360
